verse.name: v1
verse.lines: To God the only wise, our Savior and our King, let all the saints below the skies their humble praises bring.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: â€™Tis His almighty love, His counsel and His care, preserves us safe from sin and death, and ev'ry hurtful snare.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He will present our souls unblemished and complete, before the glory of His face, with joys divinely great.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then all the chosen seed shall meet around the throne, shall bless the conduct of His grace, And make His wonders known.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: To our Redeemer God wisdom and pow'r belongs, immortal crowns of majesty, and everlasting songs.
